posts.post_content: How does this change [One With Nothing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=One With Nothing) at all? =\ If you cast this first, you may as well discard One for it. If you cast One first, how are you going to cast this when you just discarded your hand? One With Nothing is for Hellbent, but there are tons of other cards (like this one, and like all the other Rituals) that work better towards that purpose.

posts.post_content:
Ooh, a whopping +0/+1. Hold me back. I can't wait to trade card advantage for transient minor effects. So tell me again why this isn't a mythic rare?
  
   
OK I suppose it you're running a necro deck and you want to get a huge guy out early, or a threshold deck and you have plenty of crap to toss aside, but definitely not a game changer.
